subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Yankees were expected to have a toned-down party if they defeated the Astros in the wild-card game, a plan in place before C. C. Sabathia said he was going into treatment for alcohol abuse.
snippet: The Yankees were expected to have a toned-down party if they defeated the Astros in the wild-card game, a plan in place before C. C. Sabathia said he was going into treatment for alcohol abuse.
